description: Test suite for the 'Agent' class and associated tools in the 'agno' project, focusing on integration tests for tool invocation, streaming responses, and multiple tool calls.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content for a price query.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool calls during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls within a single response for multiple tickers.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single response.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests tool invocation with list parameters and multiple URLs.
